backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining media, profiles, posts, friendships, and friend‑request logic with access control and blob storage mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend files used as build documentation input.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps pages with AppShell and AuthGate.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top navigation bar showing brand, navigation links, and login/profile controls.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Guard component that blocks access and shows a sign‑in prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/FriendActions.ts: Conditionally renders friend‑related action buttons based on friendship status and hooks.
frontend/src/components/FriendRequestCar: Renders a card for incoming or outgoing friend requests with accept, decline, or cancel actions and profile preview.
frontend/src/components/FriendsList.tsx: Displays a list of a user's friends with profile lookups and navigation to their profiles.
frontend/src/components/ImagePicker.tsx: Provides image upload with validation, preview, progress tracking, and removal options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Shows a sign‑in/sign‑out button using Internet Identity with login handling and query reset.
frontend/src/components/PostComposer.tsx: Form for creating posts with text, optional image upload, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/PostList.tsx: Renders a list of posts with author info, timestamps, content, and optional media.
frontend/src/components/ProfileEditor.ts: Editor form for updating user profile fields and images with save handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileImages.ts: Displays cover and avatar images with size options and fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/UserCard.tsx: Clickable user card showing avatar, name, bio, and navigating to the user's profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: React Query hooks for managing friends and friend requests, including fetching friends, checking status, and sending or handling requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, exposing identity state and login/logout functions.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosts.ts: Hooks to fetch a user's posts and create new posts, invalidating related post and timeline queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfiles.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving user profiles, including current and arbitrary user profiles using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeline.ts: Fetches the user's timeline posts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSearch.ts: Provides a placeholder hook returning all user profiles, currently returning an empty list.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the user's feed using timeline data, redirecting unauthenticated users to the landing page.
frontend/src/pages/FriendRequestsPage.ts: Shows incoming and outgoing friend requests with tabs and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page offering login via Internet Identity and highlighting app features.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Renders the signed-in user's profile page with profile editing, post creation, and a list of their posts.
frontend/src/pages/UserDirectoryPage.tsx: Displays a searchable directory of all user profiles with loading states and filtered results.
frontend/src/pages/UserProfilePage.tsx: Shows another user's profile with posts and friends list, handles invalid IDs, and redirects if viewing own profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based and standard routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, feature summaries, requirements mappings, and versioned state information.
